warezcdn.name: Kill la Kill
warezcdn.title: Kiru ra kiru: KILL la KILL

imdb.title: Kiru ra kiru: KILL la KILL
imdb.plot: A young girl arrives at a school of superhumans to find out the truth behind her father's murder.

episodes.title: Azami no gotoku toge areba
episodes.plot: Ryuko Matoi arrives at Honnoji Academy and faces off with its boxing champion. Beaten at first, she finds a suit that gives her powers and odds turn in her favour.

episodes.title: Kizetsu suru hodo nayamashî
episodes.plot: Ryuko stays over at Mako's home. She later goes up against the tennis champion of Honnoji.

episodes.title: Junketsu
episodes.plot: Satsuki, the student council president at Honnoji, decides to use her family uniform Junketsu against Ryuko.

episodes.title: Totemo fukô na asa ga kita
episodes.plot: Ryuko is faced with "No-Late Day", an event where students must navigate a trap-filled obstacle course to reach school on time, or else they will be expelled.

episodes.title: Hikigane
episodes.plot: A mysterious sniper named Tsumugu Kinagase attempts to assassinate Ryuko, but is hampered by the various clubs that try to defeat Ryuko.

episodes.title: Kibun shidai de semenaide
episodes.plot: While Ryuko tries to find out more about Tsumugu, she must face a student council member who has super-speed and can read all her moves.

episodes.title: Nikumi kirenai roku denashi
episodes.plot: Mako is offered a better life away from poverty. To do so she must don a suit and face Ryuko in combat.

episodes.title: Ore no namida wa ore ga fuku
episodes.plot: Satsuki announces a new election system where students must survive a seven-day battle with each other in order to stand out on top. One student, Ira Gamagoori, gives aid to Ryuko and later the two have to face off.

episodes.title: Chansu wa ichido
episodes.plot: Ira and Ryuko fight. Though Ira is able to dominate, Senketsu evolves a new form to defeat him.

episodes.title: Anata o - motto - shiritakute
episodes.plot: Ryuko faces her next opponents Houka Inumuta and Nonon Jakuzure. Meanwhile, her evolving uniform is a source of concern.

episodes.title: Kawaii on'na to yobanai de
episodes.plot: Nui Harime, the slayer of Ryuko's father, unexpectedly arrives.

episodes.title: Kanashimi ni tsuba o kakero
episodes.plot: Ryuko comes face to face with her father's killer, but can she contain her rage? Mako and the Elite Four look on as sh e rampages on, coming closer and closer to death. Will Satsuki or anyone else be able to stop her?

episodes.title: Kimi ni barabara... Toiu kanji
episodes.plot: Honnouji Academy is mobilizing for the Tri-City Schools Raid Trip! But after her recent rampage, Ryuko is moping in bed, unwilling to fight. However, Shinjiro Nagita, formerly with the Newspaper Club, is determined to get her back into uniform!

episodes.title: Isoge kaze no yô ni
episodes.plot: The Tri-City Schools Raid Trip has commenced! The three-pronged attack on the Kansai region is off to an interesting start, with some unusual defenses to overcome. But what part will Ryuko be able to play, with Senketsu in the hands of the enemy?

episodes.title: Dônimo tomaranai
episodes.plot: Satsuki Kiryuin joins the front line of Osaka to battle Kaneo Takarada, the heir to the Takarada Conglomerate. Using the influence of money, Takarada rallies the locals to fight, but Satsuki is suspicious there is another power behind the city's defense.

episodes.title: On'na wa sore o gaman dekinai
episodes.plot: The Tri-City Schools Raid Trip is returning to Honnouji Academy, when Satsuki Kiryuin is unexpectedly summoned home. Meanwhile, Ryuko begins to learn the truth behind the series of events that brought her and Senketsu together.

episodes.title: Naze ni omae wa
episodes.plot: Preparations are underway for the Honnouji Academy Cultural & Sports Grand Festival! The school is in a fervor as Ragyo Kiryuin will be attending, but what are her and Satsuki's real intentions for the event?

episodes.title: Yoru e isogu hito
episodes.plot: The Honnouji Academy Cultural & Sports Grand Festival comes to an abrupt and very unexpected conclusion! Battle lines are drawn and Ryuko must decide who is friend and who is foe. But will she have the power to resist the power of the Life Fiber?

episodes.title: Tadoritsuitara itsumo amefuri
episodes.plot: A startling revelation turns Ryuko's world upside down! But she's not the only one in turmoil, as Satsuki, the Elite Four and the members of Nudist Beach are left scrambling in the aftermath of the Honnouji Academy Cultural & Sports Grand Festival!

episodes.title: Tôku gunshû o hanarete
episodes.plot: Ryuko is awake and she's not happy. Intent on killing Ragyo and Nui, she heads out, leaving her allies behind. Without her power, Nudist Beach must decide what their next step is, but a new piece of intel spurs them to action!

episodes.title: Mikansei
episodes.plot: Ryuko's rampage continues, and thanks to Ragyo and Nui she has an unexpected new ally. With Satsuki as the target, will the Elite Four and Nudist Beach be able to withstand the onslaught?

episodes.title: Kuchibiru yo, atsuku kimi o katare
episodes.plot: A surprising turn of events catches Nui Harime off guard and gives Nudist Beach a chance to regroup and plan their next step in the fight against Ragyo. But will Ryuko and Satsuki be able to settle their recent conflicts?

episodes.title: Imiteishon gôrudo
episodes.plot: The ongoing battle presses towards Honnouji Academy, but Ragyo and the Original Life Fiber stand in the way. Ryuko and Satsuki set off to face them, leaving Nudist Beach's defense to... Mako?! Meanwhile, a crazed Nui continues working feverishly...

episodes.title: Hateshinaki yami no kanata ni
episodes.plot: The final confrontation is at hand! Will Ragyo and Nui bring on the end of the world, or will Ryuko and the others be able to stop them?

episodes.title: Goodbye Again
episodes.plot: It's graduation at Honnouji Academy, but not everything is as it seems. Ryuko Matio and the gang must defeat their final enemy.
